price: Sε Yεpε a nka Yεbεma mo mu bi ayԑ Soro abͻfoͻ asi moanan mu wͻ asaase so.
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَا مِنكُم مَّلَٰٓئِكَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَخۡلُفُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu lajaʿalnā minkum malāikatan fī al-arḍi yakhlufūna
